title.rendered: PG Diploma in Data Science and Business Analytics

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1588727897214{background-color: #f5f4f2 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592751548245{padding-top: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”16497″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1594323341822{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1593050786470{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}” el_id=”overview”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1592524565715{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”PG Diploma” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_id=”inner-hdln”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”79″ el_id=”inner-menu”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1592525599661{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Post Graduate in data science course provides training to develop Statistical, Computational and Programming Skills. The increasing importance of data analysis in several fields including banking, finance, entertainment, pharmaceutical, environment, economics, engineering and many more motivated us to curate a course for full time working professionals and new graduates to upskill and become eligible for lucrative job prospects.

The program aims at teaching students:

  • Theoretical and practical aspects of statistical concepts like inference, probability, Bayes Theorem, modeling
  • Programming skills like Python and R programming
  • Data visualization tools for real-world scenarios
  • Database management to clean, transform and query data.
  • Implementing machine learning algorithms to design solutions for data-oriented problems

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1592965186503{background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}” el_id=”highlights”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Key highlights” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1592917295641{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16125″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Gateway to foreign universities” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]Complete 16 years of education as required by most of the international institutions while getting an excellent foundation in the data science field.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16126″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”University of Mumbai” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]Globally recognised degree from the prestigious 160 years old University of Mumbai. Campus placed at renowned Patkar-Varde college having ‘A+ Grade’ by NAAC.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16124″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Industry approved curriculum” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]The program has been designed and taught by eminent industry experts to bring education in sync with workplace realities ensuring holistic learning.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16123″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Capstone Projects & Case Studies” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”] Capstone projects drawn from real-world problems allow students to create a product that can be used to practice their skills and showcase to potential employers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1594075089000{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_id=”softwares”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Programming softwares / tools covered” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln” css=”.vc_custom_1593544707904{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1593210809296{margin-top: 10px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}” el_id=”methodology”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Training Methodology” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]

“Knowledge has to be improved, challenged, and increased constantly, or it vanishes.”

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Classroom Learning” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Theory

In data science, mathematical skills are as important as programming skills. Subjects like Statistics, Linear algebra and Big data helps to build a profound fundamental to build reliable and efficient models

Practical

You need good programming and analytical skills to become a good data scientist which comes by practicing several tools required to solve big data problems, automate processes and write efficient algorithms.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16214″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Application Based Learning” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16141″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Case studies

Companies are using analytics to improve their process and the scale of the data they use to do this has increased tremendously over the last few years making it extremely important to learn through real-world case studies.

Industry connects

Professionals from the industry share their experiences though such sessions and talk about how data science continues to gain widespread acclaim & demand across almost every major sector.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1593210878728{background-color: #413f3f !important;}” el_id=”eligibility”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Eligibility Criteria” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”mkb-abt-red-hv slideInUp” width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”1″ font_container=”tag:p|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-center txt-white”]Graduate from any stream (Science/Commerce/Arts)[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”mkb-abt-red-hv slideInUp” width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”2″ font_container=”tag:p|font_size:30px|text_align:center|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-center txt-white”]Must have a keen interest in Statistics, Programming and Data Analysis.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1593210970578{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_id=”syllabus”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Course Syllabus” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln” css=”.vc_custom_1593210984625{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_tta_tour style=”outline” color=”blue” spacing=”30″ gap=”5″ autoplay=”10″ active_section=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1592964948925{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_class=”mkb-tab-style”][vc_tta_section title=”Semester one” tab_id=”sm1″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]This semester introduces students to statistical analysis and several programming tools, data visualisation to transform and clean the data and database management to create, retrieve, update and manage data.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Paper title” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]

  • Database Management Systems
  • Big Data architecture and ecosystem
  • Statistical Methods
  • Data Visualization – Using Power BI
  • R Programming
  • Python Programming

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Semester two” tab_id=”sem2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]This semester focuses on Time series forecasting and Machine Learning that automates analytical model building. Students learn to work on big data and advanced SQL to systematically extract information and draw insights.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Paper title” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]

  • Machine Learning and Deep Learning
  • Time Series Analysis and Forecasting
  • Advanced SQL
  • Natural Language Processing
  • Electives
    • Elective 1 – Marketing Analytics
    • Elective 2 – Financial Analytics

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tour][vc_message]SDBI offers a Diploma course at Under Graduate level as well to learn data science as an additional skillset.

UG Diploma is a one-year program offered for the students already pursuing their graduation in any field and wants to learn programming software’s, data visualisation and ML techniques. These lectures will be conducted over the weekend and will not clash with their regular college hours. To know more about the syllabus, fees, and key highlights of the program, download brochure. Contact us to know more.[/vc_message][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1608849890650{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #df3735 !important;}” el_id=”pgdownload”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Need more info about the course ?” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1594120057246{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”Download PG Diploma Brochure” style=”3d” size=”lg” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-share” add_icon=”true” link=”url:%23|||” el_class=”mkb-btn-sdbi mkb_pgdiploma”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Already Made Up Your Mind?” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1593919705094{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”Apply Now” style=”3d” color=”mulled-wine” size=”lg” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-share” add_icon=”true” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fadmission.sdbi.in%2Fapp%2F%23%2Fauth%2Fregister||target:%20_blank|rel:nofollow” el_class=”mkb-btn-sdbi mkbpopup2″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
